alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 6:29PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Churchill County through 715 PM PDT... At 629 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Fallon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Stillwater, Junction U.S 50 And NV 116 (Stuart Rd), Fallon Station and Junction U.S 95 And NV 120 (Pasture Rd). MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
